Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Boston in 2005...
Traded from Boston to Oakland on 6/6/2005 (Going to BOS: LF B. Huskey, SS M. Ellis. Going to OAK: 2B D. Uggla, CF T. Robinson)...
Traded from Oakland to Milwaukee on 5/8/2010 (Going to MIL: 3B M. Grissom Jr., CF A. Presley, LF T. Robinson. Going to OAK: P C. Fussell)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Washington on 5/15/2010 (Going to MIL: 3B S. Rolen. Going to WSH: LF K. Kelly, LF T. Robinson)...
Injured on 4/9/2011 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Traded from Washington to Milwaukee on 5/23/2011 (Going to MIL: CF T. Robinson, C W. Ramos, 3B J. Brittain. Going to WSH: P H. Okajima, P R. Stone, P J. Fikac)...
Traded from Milwaukee to New York (A) on 5/23/2011 (Going to MIL: P P. Neshek, RF I. Suzuki. Going to NYA: RF B. Abreu, P M. Wise, P M. Barnes, P T. Jungmann, CF T. Robinson)...
Injured on 7/12/2011 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2012, off Ryan Madson (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2012, off Jason Jimenez (LAA)...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 9/11/2021...
